Cluster - Class in jclustering
Implements a cluster class.

Public constructor with a pre-defined centroid and coordinates for it.
Cluster(Voxel) - Constructor for class jclustering.Cluster
Provides a shortcut for the public constructor with parameters using a Voxel to initialize the parameters.
ClusteringMetric - Class in jclustering.metrics
This abstract class provides a template with the basic functions that a metric should implement, specially the distance(double [], double[]) method.
ClusteringMetric() - Constructor for class jclustering.metrics.ClusteringMetric
 
ClusteringTechnique - Class in jclustering.techniques
This superclass should be extended by all user-implemented clustering techniques.
